thread.section_title: Citadines Trafalgar Square London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very helpful, friendly service
thread.title_full: Very helpful, friendly service - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Martin L
title: Very helpful, friendly service
text: Had a pleasant weekend stay here in a great location. Our original room was unavailable due to a last-minute electrical problem so we were offered two very comfortable studio apartments instead and a free breakfast. We also got to check in early and received a surprise bottle of wine and some chocolates. The member of staff checking us in could not have been more helpful and considerate. Ten out of ten for staff attitude and customer service.
